abilities.name: Rainbow Float
abilities.effect: If any basic Energy card attached to Flygon is the same type as any of your Pokémon, the Retreat Cost for those Pokémon is 0.

attacks.name: Sand Wall
attacks.effect: Discard a Stadium card your opponent has in play. If you do, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Flygon during your opponent's next turn.

attacks.name: Power Swing
attacks.effect: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Evolved Pokémon on your Bench.
